specs.title: Level 1: Navigation Smoke Test
Level 6: Batch Operations Smoke Test
Level 11: Reconnaissance Smoke Test
Keystroke Limit: Exceeding maxKeystrokes triggers Game Over
Time Limit: Running out of time triggers Game Over
should open and close Help modal with Alt+? and Escape
should open and close Help modal with Alt+? and Shift+Enter
should close Help modal by clicking on backdrop
should open and close Hint modal with Alt+h and Escape
should open and close Hint modal with Alt+h and Shift+Enter
should open and close Quest Map modal with Alt+m and Escape
should open and close Quest Map modal with Alt+m and Shift+Enter
should close Quest Map modal by clicking on backdrop
should open Hint modal by clicking the hint button
should open Help modal by clicking the help button
should open Quest Map modal by clicking the map button
should support navigation in Help modal with j/k keys
should support navigation in Quest Map modal with h/l and j/k keys
should open help modal with Alt+? even when other dialogs are active
should open hint modal with Alt+h even when other dialogs are active
should open map modal with Alt+m even when other dialogs are active
should open help modal with Alt+? even when ThreatAlert is active (simulated)
Level 1: SYSTEM AWAKENING - completes all navigation tasks
locates and deletes watcher_agent.sys
